channel.title: Linux Kernel Summit on hacklog
channel.description: Recent content in Linux Kernel Summit on hacklog

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2022
item.description: I will present current status and future plans for DAMON in KernelSummit'22. The title of the talk is “Current Status and Future Plans of DAMON”. https://lpc.events/event/16/contributions/1224/

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2021
item.description: I will present DAMON/DAMOS in KernelSummit'21. The title of the talk is “Writing a fine-grained access pattern-oriented lightweight kernel module using DAMON/DAMOS in 10 minutes”. https://linuxplumbersconf.org/event/11/contributions/984/

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2021
item.description: KernelSummit'21 에서 DAMON/DAMOS 를 발표하게 되었습니다. 발표 제목은 “Writing a fine-grained access pattern-oriented lightweight kernel module using DAMON/DAMOS in 10 minutes” 입니다. https://linuxplumbersconf.org/event/11/contributions/984/

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2020
item.description: My talk proposal to the Linux Kernel Summit of this year which is co-located with the Linux Plumbers Conference has accepted! Hope to (virtually) see you there. The title of the talk is, “DAMON: Data Access Monitoring Framework for Fun and Memory Management Optimizations”.

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2019
item.description: My talk proposal to the Linux Kernel Summit of this year which is co-located with the Linux Plumbers has accepted! Hope to see you in Lisbon. The title of the talk is, “Tracing Data Access Pattern with Bounded Overhead and Best-effort Accuracy”.

item.title: I will have a talk at the Linux Kernel Summit 2019
item.description: [Linux Plumbers Conference 2019] (https://www.linuxplumbersconf.org/blog/2019/) 와 함께 열리는 올해의 [Linux Kernel Summit] (https://lwn.net/Articles/788378/) 에 제안한 발표 주제가 accept 되어 9월에 리스본에서 이에 대한 내용을 발표하게 되었습니다. 발표 제목은 “Tracing Data Access Pattern with Bounded Overhead and Best-effort Accuracy” 입니다. 티켓이 너무 일찍 팔려버리는 바람에 올해는 들으러도 못가나 걱정했는데 갈 수 있게 됐네요, 다행입니다! :D
